MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock, affecting properties in Don Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.54am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the repairs caused by third party damage to our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.50pm on Friday 16th October 2020.
